Hi Brooke,

We have made some filters for the dimension.

The pattern only works with 00 x 00 x 00. 
00 x 00 x 00  ----> 00W x 00D x 00H
If you check the screenshot "Annabelle Occasional Chair Off White + Brass", the filter didn't work the reason for this was there is no space between 69x. You may need to change the dimension in order for it to work.  

I have created a column in the backend where you can easily see the dimensions (Take note the filter is not applied to this column)
https://huntleyandco.com.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=hc_products

Thanks so much Joel. Can you please let me know when the W D H (width, depth, height) has been added to the dimensions.

Kind Regards,

Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER



E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

We have made some updates to the site. Please see the attached.

Hi Brooke,

We are working on this one. We will give you an update by the end of the day. Cheers!

Hi Heath,

Confirming this request is for trade site only.

So just to rehash, dimensions are to appear alongside product name for example: ADA 3 SEAT SOFA WHITE - 197 x 84 x 87

This is to appear in product catalogue and more importantly, during selection phase so that the clients don't have to click into each product individually before making their selections.

Thanks so much.

Kind Regards,

Yes this is possible. Did you want these to appear on the public front end or in the stylists logged in area e.g. here: https://huntleyandco.com.au/dashboard/catalogues/?cat=23

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


We have had a number of clients request that the dimensions of each product be listed next to the name of the product so that they don't have to click into every single product when making their selections. For example, Ellery 3 Seat Sofa White (220W x 87D x 95H).


Is there a way to auto dump the product dimension field into the product name field or does this have to be done manually for every single product ?


Thanks so much.


Kind Regards,
Brooke Wilkinson

BROOKE WILKINSON

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER


E. BROOKE@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
